descend_to_depths.title: Into the Harmonic Chaos
descend_to_depths.description: Descending into the Singing Depths, the chaotic harmonics assault your senses. Navigation crystals crack in your hands, and the usual singing has become a discordant shriek. At the deepest accessible level, you find the source: massive crystal formations pulsing with unnatural rhythms, as if something is forcing them to sing against their nature.

choices.text: 'These crystals are being manipulated by an outside force.'
'I need to attempt communication with whatever's doing this.'
'The damage might be reversible if I can find the control mechanism.'
'This is connected to the other crisis situations.'
